title: Adhan during lockdown: Hayya ‘ala as-salaah, hayya ‘ala al-falaah/ Sallu fi buyutikum Assimalhakeem
transcript: why do they say hey Alice Allah come to prayer come to success when we are in lockdown because this is the Sunnah to give the Adhan as normal and at the end you say so Luffy boo utakome oh so Luffy a honeycomb the other way is to say that I then and skip hi Alice hi Alice LaHaye al Farah and say assalatu fee boo you to command said and both are authentic so either one is okay insha'Allah
